desc.p: Capital PL in reference currency. Recalculated using PL.CAPITAL.SEC and NB.EXRATE or VEH.EXRATE based on the parameter specified in AM.PERF.PARAMETER.
Contains the Net Book cost in security currency. Recalculated using the flow amount.
Contains the running book cost. Recalculated using net.amt.sec.ccy and no.nominal
Associated Multi-value field along with TRANS.REF
Contains the Net Book cost in referenece currency. Recalculated using the flow amount in reference currency.
Flag to indicate whether the exchange rate used is the transaction time exchange rate or exchange rate as of EOD. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed.
Associated Muti-value along with TRANS.REF field.
Contains the Total PL in reference currency. Recalculated using specified PLs in reference currency.
Contains the VALUE.DATE of the transaction. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Contains the end of day accrued interest in reference currency. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Contains the TRADE.CCY of the given transaction . Form an associated Multi-value with TRANS.REF field. Defaulted from the corresponding field of the AM.INST.VEH record.
Associated Multivalue along with the TRANS.REF field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Start of the multi-value. Gives the transaction reference of the flow. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the income PL . recalculated using the end values and running book cost.
Contains the running accrued interest in reference currency. Recalculated using NB.ACCR.INT.SEC and NB.EXRATE.
Income PL in reference currency. Recalculated using income PL and NB.EXRATE or VEH.EXRATE based on the parameter specified in AM.PERF.PARAMETER.
Contains the end of day end of day estimation. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Contains the estimation in reference currency. Recalculated using NB.ESTIMATION.SEC and NB.EXRATE.
Contains the transaction code for the given transaction reference. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH file.
Contains the end of day cost for the given instrumrent. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Flag to indicate whether a Free receipt recalculation has occurred or not. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed.
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specifies whether the AM.INST.VEH record has been manually corrected or not. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
The valid values for this field are as follows.
1. M - the flow value has been manually recalculated.
2. R - the flow has been recalculated due to a backvalue event.
Contains the STMT.ENTRY id for account related flows. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field
Contains the AM.INST.VEH id. ID of this file should be a valid AM.INST.VEH id.
Contain the end of day estimation in ref ccy. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Contains the running transaction cost. Recalculated using the charge amount in each of the flows.
Contains the estimation in security currency. Recalculated using previous days estimation and current days flows.
Contains the date on which the transaction was reversed. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.

Indicates whether the flow is an income flow or not. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH. On updating this field as 'Y', the flow will be updated as an Income type flow . The field ACCR.INT.SEC will be updated.
Contains the recoverable tax. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed.

t.desc:
Contains the exchange rate between the instrument and the portfolio reference ccy
used for the transaction. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed.
Manual update to this field will result in the recalculation of NET.AMT.REF.CCY field of the corresponding transaction.
Validation Rules:
Standard T24 RATE field
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field

desc.p: Contains the revenue amount for flows defined as revenue flows in the DIARY.TYPE record.
The amount gets updated on a corporate action event. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field.
Contains the Total PL . recalculated using the total of all the previously recalculated values.
Contains the exchange rate. Recalculated using the NB.NET.VAL.REF and NB.NET.VAL.SEC.
Defines the category of flow for the transaction
. Flows can be classified into various types.
The various types of flows include
Z flows - these arre weighted flows which contribute to the calcuation of Average Invested Capital.
Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed . On manually changing this field , the INFLOW/OUTFLOW or AICINFLOW/AICOUTFLOW field will be recalcuated.
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Contains the end of day estimation inclusive of the accrued interest. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Contains the end of day accrued interest. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Contains the NET.AMT in Reference currency. Recalculated using the NET.EXRATE.SEC.
Manual update to the fields ACCR.INT.SEC, TXN.COST.SEC ,NET.AMT.SEC.CCY or NET.EXRATE.SEC will result in the recalculation of NET.AMT.REF.CCY field.
Associated Multi-value field along with TRANS.REF
Contains the running accrued interest. Recalculated using the previous days accrued interest and accrued interest in flows
Contains the Forex pl in reference currency. Recalculated using the running book costs and the end values.
Gives the Nominal quantity associated with a given transaction. The fiekl is defaulted from the corresponding field of the AM.INST.VEH record.
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field.
Indicates whether the flow is a revenue flow. This is for specifying whether the flow is included in the accrued revenue. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Associated Multi-value along with the field TRANS.REF
Contains the total of all the outflows. Recalculated using the flow amounts.
Contains the end of day exchange rate. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Contains the Fees PL. recalculated using the NB.TXN.COST

Indicates whether the flow is a fee flow or not. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH. Can be manually changed. This will result in the flow being removed from the NET.AMT.SEC.CCY field and put in the TXN.COST.SEC field.

t.desc:
Contains the total of
all the inflows. Recalculated using the flow amounts.
Validation Rules:
Standard T24 Amount field
Noinput field.

desc.p: Contains the capital PL . Recalculated using the end values and the running book cost.

t.desc:
Contains the Net amount of
the transaction. Calculated using the market price, txn cost and Accrued interest . Can be manually changed.
The field will be recalculated if there is a change in the MARKET.PRICE, ACCRUED.INTEREST or TXN.COST.SEC fields for the given transaction.
Manaul update to this field will result in the recalculation of NET.AMT.REF.CCY field of the AM.INST.VEH.MAN file
Validation Rules:
Standard T24 AMOUNT field
Associated Multivalue along with TRANS.REF

desc.p: Charge amount associated with the given transaction. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH. Can be manually changed. On manually changing this field, the field NET.AMT.SEC.CCY and NET.AMT.REF.CCY will be automatically updated.
Associated Multi-value along with the TRANS.REF field
Contains the accrued revenue. It is the cumulative revenue flow. Recalculated using the REVENUE.AMT field in the various multi-values.

Contains the Market.price used for the transaction. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . Can be manually changed. On manual input this field results in the recalculation of NET.AMT.SEC.CCY and NET.AMT.REF.CCY fields.
Contains the end of day estimation inclusive of the accrued interest in reference currency. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH.
Contains the TRADE.DATE of the transaction . Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH
Fee PL in reference currency . Recalculated using fee PL and NB.EXRATE or VEH.EXRATE based on the parameter specified in AM.PERF.PARAMETER
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

Accrued interest associated with the transaction. Defaulted from AM.INST.VEH . can be manually changed. On manually changing this field the NET.AMT.SEC.CCY and the NET.AMT.REF.CCY fields will be automatically recalculated.
Associated Multi-value along with TRANS.REF field.
Contains the Cumulative of Adjusted aic inflow. These flows are found using a specific type of a cash flow.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
